name: Tumblr I Decided badges
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Show that you voted in the Tumblr Decision 2016! :) As part of Tumblr's 2016 "april fools joke" anyone who voted in the Tumblr Decision 2016 received a "I Decided" badge on their icon. It has since been removed. This style will put an "I Decided" badge on all icons on your dashboard.

user.name: CodyMKW
user.about: Hey my name is Cody I’m 31 years old I like to play Nintendo games, and I’m a former member of the retired Splatoon team known as Squids Next Door my favorite game series are Mario Kart, Animal Crossing, and Splatoon.
